name: Blood Red
description:
Blood Red is an immersive co-op horror game that plunges players into a world
where ancient dark ritual stones have fallen from the sky, possessing an ominous power that
endangers innocent lives. As agents of P.A.R.M.A, the Paranormal Anomaly Research and
Metaphysical Agency, players must investigate the origin and nature of these malevolent
artifacts.

In this heart-pounding supernatural adventure, players will navigate through atmospheric
environments,craft ritual stones, and confront nightmarish demons in combat. With seamless
1-4 player co-op gameplay, teamwork and communication are crucial for survival.
Coordinate your efforts, combine your skills, and overcome terrifying challenges together.

Intense co-op horror experience for 1-4 players

  • Detect the Demon Type!
    Use all the tools at your disposal to find out which demon you're facing.


  • Fight For Your Survival!
    Use your melee or ranged weapon to fight foes that are called the "Dark Companions."


  • Craft Ritual Stones!
    Craft ritual stones using all the crafting parts you have gathered.
